channel.title: Need Help with Mail/Signup Script
channel.description:
Hey everyone.
I want/need a script for a website i have recently done. I want to add a sign-up option on the front page where you simply enter your email adress and press enter then their email to be added to a database.
For example if there was a website named www.Freebentley.co.uk and you can register by typing in your email and presing enter.
If you know about these scripts like know the name of one or even have one! can you please post or mail me :D
Thank you very very much! Joe/Blapmanjr/Joarias

item.title: Need Help with Mail/Signup Script
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

[quote=“OnlyOneRule, post:1, topic:273317”][quote author=chrisn2323 link=topic=360125.msg2746764#msg2746764 date=1239668587]

Erm so where do i put that :S

Up your fucking ass.

Seriously. What do i do with this :S

You add the shit you use to connect to the database:
[php]
mysql_connect(“host”,“username”,“password”);
mysql_select_db(“database”);
[/php]

Then save it as a .php file. You then make a table in your database a…

I give up. Why are there so many 10 year olds on these forums?

Fuck you

  1. Im 15
  2. I’ve never done anything like this before
  3. Go loose your virginity
  4. Dont like the community? Then leave nerd…

Also i know its a form. I just dont know how to set this up… Id say thanks for the help but your reading this OnlyOneRule then GTFO!

I’d watch who you talk to like that. Personally I feel the urge for beating the shit out of you right now. You don’t know me and you don’t know half of what I can do or the people I know. I don’t take shit from anybody. Note if you make another smart comment about me like that you could end up in serious trouble. There is a list of people I know who live close to you that wouldn’t mind setting a few things straight for me. I don’t mean to terrorise but this is a threat.

All I did was point you in the right direction hoping that you would be able to use what I gave you to look up some tutorials. I’m not a teacher and don’t expect anyone else here to be one either. Most of the people here sort things out for themselves with just a few tips. Why should you be the special one and receive all the attention?

rofl you dumb ass white boy dork gtfo you dumb ass b4 i trace your ip and beat ur white ass
[/quote]
You do realise I have all his details and could very easily get him killed. This isn’t a joke.

Joe White, Doncaster, Yorkshire, England.

And I’d love too see you beat my white ass. You don’t know half of what I’ve been involved with in the past and why I now live abroad.[/quote]

stfu bitch fegget chris hemmens.

brb ic3.gov

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with Mail/Signup Script
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

Here you go:
[php]<?php
if(isset($POST[‘email’])){ // make sure they’ve submitted the form
if(preg_match(’/^[A-Z0-9.%±]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+.[A-Z]{2,4}$/i’,$email)){ // sift out bad e-mails
$connect = @mysql_connect(‘localhost’,‘username’,‘password’); // mysql connection
@mysql_select_db(‘users’,$connect); // mysql database selection
@mysql_query(‘INSERT INTO emails VALUES (NULL,"’.$email.’");’,$connect); // query
die(‘Inserted e-mail successfully!’);
} else {
$response = ‘Invalid e-mail!’;
}
}
echo ‘’;
echo ‘
’;
echo ‘’;
echo ‘’;
if(isset($response)){
echo $response;
}
?>[/php]

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with Mail/Signup Script
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

okey… let me make something very clear Blapmanjr… you do NOT come here and expect people to make or go look for scripts for you. infact if you used google read some of the stuff to do with this you could do it all by your self, but no, Obviously your to lazy to even attempt to learn anything. So my advice to you is;

a) Grow the fuck up, You may be 15. But your acting like a 10 year old.
b) Go actually look on google for some tutorials to do with php, a good site is www.phpvideotutorials.com
c) go talk to someone about puberty, i think it may be fucking up your head.
d) have some respect for people who actually try and help onlyonerule gave you a working script, obviously you don’t know the 1st thing that is needed to even work with php or you could have easley worked out what to do with that.
e) stop being so god dam lazy, your lucky you got that much help. Personally i would have redirected you to the good old site called Google.
f) GTFO ->

Read full topic
